summary:
Mashup of various pieces from UNP outfits, retextured to suit.

Specifically for the female, but will be a regular, un-retextured Redguard outfit if worn by a male. Comes in four colours, Yellow, Blue, Green and Purple. You can find it in Saadia's room in the Bannered Mare, in an added chest. This respawns,
descriptionHtml:
[*]UNP outfit mashup, with new textures.[/*]
[*] [/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*]Originally made as a home outfit for Rayya, but released without any dependency on Hearthfires, so any Redguard can wear it. [/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*]
[b]Where to get it: [/b]In a chest I added to Saadia's room at the Bannered Mare. It's marked as player-owned, so you don't have to steal. The chest will respawn, so if you want an identical one for your follower, just be patient and go back for another.
[/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*][b]Stats: [/b]This is just clothing, like the Redguard Clothes. A male will get an outfit identical to the regular Redguard clothes, just with a different FormID.
[/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*]
[b]Requires: [/b]UNP body - all the pieces I put together were UNP. There may be CBBE or other versions of those, and it would be better to look for those and apply my textures, than ask me to convert the meshes I borrowed.
[/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*]
[b]Credits:[/b][/*]
[*][/*]
[*][/*]
[*]Leggings adapted from LSAR by Cotyounoyume[/*]
[*][/*]
[*]Sash/belt from UNP Simply Clothes by Petrovich[/*]
[*]Bra ripped off a passing wench[/*]
[*]Panties from something by Nightasy, I think.[/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*]
[/*]
[*][b]Things to come:[/b] I'm working on additional colours, and an alternate top.
[/*]
author: ghastley
